channel.title: Docker on DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on DevOps Engineer

item.title: How to use Jenkins Docker Cloud
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article explains how to use Jenkins Docker Cloud for building and deploying applications, including setting up a Docker host and creating custom Docker images.

item.title: Docker Buildx Bake—A Powerful Tool for Accelerating Builds and Managing Multi-platform Images
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the concept, advantages, use cases, and how to use Docker Buildx Bake to accelerate the building and management of multi-platform images.

item.title: Developing on Windows Just Got Awesome using WSL + VS Code + Docker Desktop - Worth a Try
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces how to develop on Windows using WSL, VS Code, and Docker Desktop. It provides detailed installation and configuration steps, as well as the advantages and experience of using these tools.

item.title: Docker, containerd, CRI, CRI-O, OCI, runc Explained and How They Work Together
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the key components and standards in the container ecosystem, such as Docker, containerd, CRI, CRI-O, OCI, and runc, explaining their relationships and how they work together.

item.title: Vagrant vs. Docker —— Which One Should You Choose?
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article compares Vagrant and Docker, analyzing their respective use cases and advantages to help readers choose the right tool for managing virtual machines or containers.

item.title: You Must Know These 17 Docker Best Practices!
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article shares some best practices to follow when writing Dockerfiles and using Docker, including suggestions on multi-stage builds, image optimization, and security.
